reviews.review: Es un muy Buen juego, no requiere mucho, tiene una buena historia y un buen desarrollo, claramente lo recomiendo es un juego corto pero muy entretenido.

This game is an absolute masterpiece, certainly my favourite game of all time. The story is just what you expect from a Bioshock series, brilliant, unique, with a mind-blowing ending. Columbia is a beautiful setting, bright, colourful, a far cry from Bioshock 1 & 2 Rapture, but behind all of that, it is a city filled with ugliness, gory and dark secrets. The characters are great and the voice acting is the best that you can ask for. 

The most standout feature of this game is definitely Elizabeth. She is such a sweet and charming girl. To say that she is the best AI partner in video games is definitely an understatement. Elizabeth resembles an actual girl that can convey emotions throughout the game, react differently according to the situations, assist you in combat, and every interaction with her is meaningful. 

There is no other games that hooked me up emotionally like this game did. It is one of the game that is so good you canâ€™t stop thinking about it.

Story was incredible, but gameplay was a little too repetative. 
Graphics, for the time it was released, are beautiful!
8.5/10 
- Only because of gameplay. At some points you need to go to one place, shoot a lot of enemies, then go to the another place, shoot alot of enemies and so on. 
But when you finish all of that, storyline starts going and it's freaking awesome!

This is on another level, no, on another dimension, when compared to its predecessors. Not only it aged wonderfully, but its pace and dynamics rivals those of modern games. A must have, and a must play. The dichotomy between the protagonists, and the sudden regret(s), together with the weight of their choices, is well reflected throuout the events of the game. The gunplay is overall balanced, and rewards highly your precision and skill. My only complaint is linked to the skylines and the skyline system, which could be executed a little better, especially when it comes to following directions while riding them. Other than that, this title offers everything one might need/want. Even if you're not a BioShock fan, would you kindly buy and play this title?
Finally finished the Bioshock trilogy.Interesting twist at the end. Good game !

Simple task: Bring the girl and your debt is paid, What could go wrong right?
Ooofff.. Get ready for the craziest ride of your lifetime.

You realize this girl is not an ordinary girl, the girl have powers and a very complicated family problem that turned into Multi Universe Cold War...

You will keep asking yourself what have you done to deserve this kind of crazy treatment if you were in the Protagonist shoes.
Muy probablemente el mejor juego jamas creado
zera o jogo de uma vez que vc fica no crack

Your actions really have consequence, who would have thought. This game is an interesting ride with a phenomenally designed world (wish it was open world like borderlands but whatever), complex characters will always make a game enjoyable, which is exactly what Booker and Elizabeth are. Story is alright, not remarkable, the mechanics which the story explores are great. Guns are always an iffy one, you can really do it well or not, sometimes I hit one shots, sometimes I didn't, I don't know could just be a skill issue. Most of the guns I discarded and rolled almost exclusively with the cabine rifle. 

Its like a 6/10 I guess, defo a pick up on sale.
Great game i killed 50 people with a crow
I played this game to simp for Elizabeth, not mess with my mind
Very fun, clash in the cloud blue ribbon challenges destroy me tho

I never thought this game existed back in 2013, then I bought it and played it, the game play is impressive, this can be called as semi-open world which explores the area where we could find scattered items around the map, that's what I love this game, the game also has an impressive story nevertheless the game feels like retro-future tools scattered around whether the game took place in 1912. it's the first time I play the game with these unique features, love it very much! I recommend y'all to buy the game in sale tho, if you want to spare your money in the mean of time XD
